npcSpeech.text: Hey! I just saw Jane!! You have to hurry or they'll catch you!!! I was so surprised they hadn't already found you... you must be really quick at solving these mazes!
What! No! You can't do that! I promised Presbyter I'd help you get away for as long as possible!
What! Oh no... He told me not to tell you... Yes Presbyter sent me and I've been helping you all along.
I'm not! Don't be a fool! I promised Presbyter I'd help you escape and I will keep that promise!
Oh no... He told me not to tell you... Yes, he sent me to help you... Damn...
I'm sure you have some questions... I'll answer one but then you have to go!

He did a lot for me that man. I know it's hard to tell but I was an Imp before. I went to Gemtech with the help of Presbyter. You see I didn't have enough money for the transformation but he kindly helped me get it. My life's changed so much since then. I'm sure you can understand! I have a better job and better health benefits. Imps are only one syllable tall!
That is fair... I have never regretted it.
He only told me it was very important that I protect you. He said you mattered a lot to him and all Imps...
Presbyter is a very wise man... he basically created the technology that GemTech stands on. If he says you are important then you must be.
One question was our agreement. Please take what I said seriously even if you do not understand the full extent of matters yet.
